name: @enterprise/micro-frontend-template
description: Enterprise-grade micro-frontend template based on qiankun

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter main-app dev" "pnpm --filter react-micro-app dev" "pnpm --filter vue3-micro-app dev"
scripts.clean: pnpm -r clean && rm -rf node_modules deploy build-report.json
scripts.build:packages: pnpm --filter @enterprise/shared-types build && pnpm --filter @enterprise/shared-utils build && pnpm --filter @enterprise/micro-app-sdk build && pnpm --filter @enterprise/shared-components build && pnpm --filter @enterprise/monitoring-sdk build && pnpm --filter @enterprise/dev-tools build
